mapper.insert: insert into insurance_product (insurance_product_name, basic_insurance_premium, insurance_money, insurance_product_type, payment_cycle, payment_period, approval) values( #{insurance_product_name}, #{basic_insurance_premium}, #{insurance_money}, #{insurance_product_type}, #{payment_cycle}, #{payment_period}, #{approval} )
mapper.update: update insurance_product set insurance_product_name = #{insurance_product_name}, basic_insurance_premium = #{basic_insurance_premium}, insurance_money = #{insurance_money}, payment_cycle = #{payment_cycle}, payment_period = #{payment_period} where insurance_product_num = #{insurance_product_num}
